ingredients.item: 280g pack Waitrose 2 Boneless Scottish Salmon Fillets
2 tsp Clearspring Organic Japanese Brown Rice Miso
265g pack Waitrose Chinese Vegetable Stir Fry
275g pack Waitrose Sweet Chilli Egg Noodles

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6.
Place the salmon in a small roasting tin, spread the miso paste over the top and bake for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the Chinese vegetables for 3 minutes. Microwave the noodles according to the pack instructions and add to the stir-fry with the soy sauce.
Serve the salmon on top of the noodle stir-fry.
